metoffice.title: Yellow warning of wind affecting South West England
metoffice.summary: Yellow warning of wind affecting South West England: Bath and North East Somerset, Bournemouth Christchurch and Poole, Bristol, Cornwall, Devon, Dorset, Gloucestershire, Isles of Scilly, North Somerset, Plymouth, Somerset, South Gloucestershire, Swindon, Torbay, Wiltshire valid from 2300 Fri 03 Oct to 1800 Sat 04 Oct

heat.text: Little impact observed on health, healthcare services and social care provision. Business as usual.

cold.text: Little impact observed on health, healthcare services and social care provision. Business as usual.
